org.trianacode.discovery.protocols.tdp

Class TDPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thinginitself.http.Resource
      • org.trianacode.discovery.protocols.tdp.TDPServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.thinginitself.http.Locatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalTrawler

    public abstract class TDPServer
extends org.thinginitself.http.Resource
    A base implementation of a Triana Discovery Protocol (BonjourService) server, which handles requests and delegates the handling of those requests to the specific protocol.
